mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sys_interface_id AS "sysInterfaceId.id", a.interfaceurl AS "interfaceurl"
LEFT JOIN sys_interface_whitelist b ON b.id = a.sys_interface_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_interface( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, sys_interface_id, interfaceurl ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysInterfaceId.id}, #{interfaceurl} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_interface SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, sys_interface_id = #{sysInterfaceId.id}, interfaceurl = #{interfaceurl} WHERE id = #{id}
